page.title: 20EDUCATION IN LAUGHARNE
page.content: Education starts with Mother & Toddler group followed by Pre-school Playgroup with 16 pupils, 2 teachers, 1 mother, all voluntary. Laugharne's VCP School has 94 pupils and 5 teachers. It shares a governing body with 3 other Primary schools. An informal PTA exists, last year raising about Â£1,500. A few Laugharne children attend St Clears Primary school and about 9 are taken to a Private school near Amroth. Selecton at 11-plus results in some pupils going to St Clears Secondary school and others to Whitland Grammar school. Two boys from Laugharne went on to Further or Higher education in 1985, one from each school. There are no adult education classes in the area now. Compiled by Mrs J Sampey and Mrs Y Barnicoat. Processed by Mrs P D Evans technical assistance from M B Davis.
